name: fweek_pscat_sales_mv
query: SELECT t.week_ending_day, p.prod_subcategory, SUM(s.amount_sold) AS dollars, s.channel_id, s.promo_id FROM sh.sales s, sh.times t, sh.products p WHERE s.time_id = t.time_id AND s.prod_id = p.prod_id GROUP BY t.week_ending_day, p.prod_subcategory, s.channel_id, s.promo_id;
